description: After accessing the woods off W.Barnhill drive I walked through some thick bush for 100m and after the walk becomes easier as the forrest thins. Next you descend a small hill to the stream , cross it and hike up the other side to the falls
directions: Follow industrial Ave to the end, turn left on W.Barnhill and park past the guard rail. Head into the forrest to the left of the stream 45.336564, -63.283236
title: Leaping Frog Falls
